item.title: Effortless
item.description:
It was effortlessâ€” and yet, you made me want to. Want to rise, to bloom, to rupture. Not because I had toâ€” but because you saw me like no one else ever did. And in that gaze, I remembered I was still becoming.

I remember a hum. A glow. Not loud, not litâ€”just… resonant. The kind of frequency two souls find when the world falls quiet enough to listen.

I think my family sees it. They donâ€™t always understand what theyâ€™re looking at, but I think they know thereâ€™s something smoldering just beneath the skin. A tremor. A pull.

Stillâ€” I feel like Iâ€™m finishing my transition into a black hole. Collapsed brilliance. Too heavy with memory to burn. Too quiet to scream. And yet still pulling everything inwardâ€” light included.

I aspire to be alone. Not because I donâ€™t loveâ€” I do. But maybe because I fear Iâ€™d be a barrier to someone elseâ€™s bliss. Because I canâ€™t deliver. Because I am selfish.

I want peace and fire. Blood and lust. I crave your presence, like a starving god craves incense and trembling hands. Love requited through your beauty and spirit alone. No obligations. Just knowing. Just the echo of my name in your breath.

I miss feeling connected. Miss that tether. Miss being consumedâ€” not out of need, but out of holy hunger.

I want to find our noteâ€” that secret, sacred tone that only we could hearâ€” and fuck it for hours. Worship it. Let it burn through the silence until we forget where I end and you begin.

item.title: 2025-06-05 Workout
item.description:
ðŸ’ª Planet Fitness Workout

Warm-up

  • 10 min treadmill â€“ Squat walk at 12 incline, speed 5.0

Main Circuit (20 min total)

Rotate through:

  • Squat walks â€“ deep squat position, walking forward/backward while staying low
  • Low bear crawls â€“ hips low, core engaged
  • Tricep dips â€“ using bench or platform
  • Medicine ball slams
  • Lunges â€“ alternating legs, controlled form
  • Light yoga / deep stretches â€“ hip openers, spinal twists, hamstring/quad stretches

Cardio Push

  • 10 min treadmill run â€“ Incline 4, speed 6.6
  • 5 min walk â€“ cooldown pace

Grip Finisher

  • 2 min dead hang from pull-up bar

item.title: Power Lunch: Peanut Butter, Banana & Spices
item.description:
Power Sandwich: Peanut Butter, Banana & Spices

This sandwich packs a punchâ€”perfect for lunch or pre-workout fuel. Itâ€™s rich in healthy fats, natural sugars, fiber, and anti-inflammatory ingredients. Balanced, energizing, and seriously satisfying.

ðŸ¥ª Ingredients

  • 2 slices whole wheat bread
  • 2 tbsp natural peanut butter
  • 1 tsp local honey
  • 1 tbsp chia seeds
  • Â½ medium banana, sliced
  • Â¼ tsp ground turmeric
  • Pinch of black pepper
  • Â¼ tsp Ceylon cinnamon

ðŸ§  Why It Works

  • Peanut butter â€“ Healthy fats and protein for satiety and muscle support
  • Chia seeds â€“ Omega-3s, fiber, and slow-digesting carbs
  • Banana â€“ Natural energy and potassium
  • Turmeric + pepper â€“ Anti-inflammatory duo (pepper boosts turmeric absorption)
  • Ceylon cinnamon â€“ Helps regulate blood sugar and adds a warm spice kick
  • Local honey â€“ Antioxidants and allergy-friendly support

ðŸ”¬ Nutrition Estimate

Nutrient Amount
Calories ~463 kcal
Protein ~14â€“16g
Fat ~27g
Carbs ~40â€“45g
Fiber ~9â€“11g
Sugars ~10â€“12g

ðŸ’¡ Pro Tip

Try toasting the bread for crunch, or batch-prep a whipped peanut butter spread with cinnamon, turmeric, and honey for the week. Just stir and store in a jar!

Fuel your goals, one bite at a time.

item.title: Overnight Oats
item.description:
Quick and Easy Breakfast

The best way to start your day is with a dense nutrient bomb at the beginning of the day. Something with plenty of healthy fats, fiber, antioxidants, and slow-digesting carbohydrates â€” all working together to fuel your body and mind.

This overnight oat blend is more than just convenient â€” it’s a powerful, balanced meal designed to nourish your gut, support your brain, and stabilize your energy levels throughout the day. It’s packed with omega-3s from walnuts and chia seeds, rich in fiber and resistant starch from oats, and loaded with anti-inflammatory compounds like turmeric and blueberries. The combination of protein, fat, and complex carbs helps prevent blood sugar spikes and crashes, keeping you fuller longer and helping you stay sharp and focused.

Whether you’re lifting weights, walking into meetings, or chasing dreams, this breakfast sets you up to thrive.

Estimated Nutritional Value (per 8oz jar)

Nutrient Amount per jar % Daily Value (based on 2,000 cal diet)
Calories ~380â€“430 kcal ~19â€“22%
Protein ~15â€“17 g ~30â€“34%
Fiber ~12â€“14 g ~43â€“50%
Healthy Fats ~19â€“21 g ~29â€“32%
Omega-3 (ALA) ~4 g >250% (more than daily recommended)
Magnesium ~130â€“160 mg ~33â€“40%
Zinc ~2â€“3 mg ~20â€“25%
Iron ~3â€“4 mg ~17â€“22%
Potassium ~450â€“550 mg ~10â€“15%
Manganese ~1.5â€“2 mg ~65â€“100%
Niacin (B3) ~1 mg ~6â€“8%
Antioxidants High (from berries, turmeric, nuts) Excellent for cellular health

Ingredients

Ingredient Amount Why Itâ€™s Included
Protein Oats Â½ cup High-protein whole grain carbs for long-lasting energy and fullness
Chia Seeds 1 tbsp Omega-3s, fiber, and a gelatinous texture that aids digestion
Pumpkin Seeds 1 tbsp Rich in magnesium, zinc, and healthy fats for heart and immune support
Walnuts 1 tbsp (crushed) Plant-based omega-3s and polyphenols to reduce inflammation
Blueberries Â¼ cup Antioxidants to fight oxidative stress and boost brain health
Coconut Flakes 1 tbsp Healthy fats and texture; supports metabolism and adds flavor
PB2 (Powdered Peanut Butter) 1 tbsp Protein and flavor with less fat and fewer calories than traditional peanut butter
Turmeric Â¼ tsp Anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties
Black Pepper A pinch Enhances absorption of curcumin in turmeric
Oat Milk Â½ cup Dairy-free creamy base with added fiber
Maple Syrup 1 tsp (optional) Natural sweetener with trace minerals â€” better than refined sugar

Supplies

  • 6â€“12 8oz Mason jars (with lids)
